content:
I read the documentation about syncldap-user which seems a pretty good feature. At the beginning we will use zulip only in a partial group. So I want to know at which time a ldap-user become an zulip-user. This has influence on the list of users in the right side and for the permission "A user can create a stream after n days.".
Will it happens via sync or only if a user login the first time?
@niels only when the user logs in the first time.
